lead_paragraph: LEAD: Gov. George Deukmejian today vetoed a bill to make the Banana Slug the official state mollusk. ''It is not representative of the international reputation California enjoys,'' the Governor said. The bill to recognize the slug, which is bright yellow and about the size of a banana, was introduced in the House of Assembly on behalf of the Redwood Campfire Kids, a children's group.
